show.title: Disney's Encanto
show.headline: There is a little magic in all of us ... almost all of us

event.title: <show-title>Disney's Encanto</show-title> <event-type-title>Dubbed</event-type-title>
event.headline: Presentado en español
event.description: Walt Disney Animation Studios’ ENCANTO tells the tale of an extraordinary family, the Madrigals, who live hidden in the mountains of Colombia, in a magical house, in a vibrant town, in a wondrous, charmed place called an Encanto. The magic of the Encanto has blessed every child in the family with a unique gift from super strength to the power to heal-every child except one, Mirabel. But when she discovers that the magic surrounding the Encanto is in danger, Mirabel decides that she, the only ordinary Madrigal, might just be her exceptional family’s last hope.The film features all-new songs by Emmy, GRAMMY and Tony Award winner Lin-Manuel Miranda (“Hamilton,” “Moana”) and is directed by Byron Howard (“Zootopia,” “Tangled”) and Jared Bush (codirector “Zootopia”), co-directed by Charise Castro Smith (writer “The Death of Eva Sofia Valdez”) and produced by Clark Spencer and Yvett Merino.

show.title: House of Gucci
show.headline: High crimes and haute couture abound in this lavish melodrama

event.title: <show-title>House of Gucci</show-title> <event-type-title>Dress Up Screening</event-type-title>
event.description: HOUSE OF GUCCI is inspired by the shocking true story of the family empire behind the Italian fashion house of Gucci. Spanning three decades of love, betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately murder, we see what a name means, what it’s worth, and how far a family will go for control.

eventType.title: Costume Screening
eventType.headline: You don’t need an excuse to dress up. But now you have one.
eventType.description: From James Bond Black Tie screenings to DESPERATELY SEEKING SUSAN ‘80s bashes to STAR WARS cosplay parties, we’ve got all the excuses you need to live your fully-costumed truth.

show.title: It's a Wonderful Life
show.headline: Jimmy Stewart lassos our hearts in this holiday classic

show.title: Elf
show.headline: The best way to spread Christmas cheer

event.title: <show-title>Elf</show-title> <event-type-title>Movie Party</event-type-title>
event.headline: With themed games, props, and singing loud for all to hear
event.description:
"Buddy the Elf, what's your favorite color?"

Don’t be a cotton-headed ninnymuggins this holiday season. Come out to Alamo Drafthouse and spread the cheer at this sugar-fueled, interactive holiday spectacular, packed with games, props, and, of course, singing loud for all to hear.

Bundle up for this celebration of one of the best holiday films ever made, period. Will Ferrell’s take on a North Pole elf trying to figure out Manhattan (“Watch out! The yellow ones don’t stop!”) just might be the funniest he’s ever been.

Our ELF Movie Party features all sorts of fun props, a themed contest before the film, and a “real” snowball fight in the theater!

show.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
show.headline: Nothing but the best for the Griswold Family Christmas

event.title: <show-title>National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation</show-title> <event-type-title>Movie Party</event-type-title>
event.headline: Celebrate the season like an honorary Griswold.
event.description:
No one knows how to do vacations like the Griswolds. Sure, their holidays are wild, chaotic, and often fraught with peril, but everyone’s family gatherings are a little stressful, aren’t they? Fortunately, you can just let Clark and the gang shoulder all that stress while you enjoy the ride at our CHRISTMAS VACATION Movie Party.

We’re giving it the full Movie Party treatment, with special props like pine tree air fresheners, yellow glowsticks, and ugly neckties to help you feel like you're an honorary Griswold. It’ll be more fun than a membership to the Jelly of the Month Club.

show.title: Sing 2
show.headline: Dream big dreams in this show-stopping musical sensation

event.title: <show-title>Sing 2</show-title> <event-type-title>Early Access</event-type-title>
event.headline: See the animated musical extravaganza before anyone else
event.description: This holiday season, the new chapter in Illumination’s smash animated franchise arrives with big dreams and spectacular hit songs as the ever-optimistic Buster Moon and his all-star cast of performers prepare to launch their most dazzling stage extravaganza yet …all in the glittering entertainment capital of the world. There’s just one hitch: They first have to persuade the world’s most reclusive rock star—played by global music icon Bono, in his animated film debut—to join them.

titleCardImage.altText: Special Event Event Type Title Card

marketStrings.value: The personal closed captioning device displays feature film dialogue and other audio in the form of English-language text for individuals who are deaf or hard of hearing.

The descriptive audio headset provides individuals who are blind or have low vision with an English-language narration of the details of the feature presentation that can't be understood by the soundtrack alone.

The assisted listening headset provides an amplified audio signal for those individuals who are hard of hearing. A 3.5mm headphone jack is available to drive hearing aids, neck loops, or cochlear implants.
You may not enter a movie after it has started. If you show up to your desired screening late, we will happily exchange your ticket for a different showtime or for a raincheck to a future show.

sessionAttributes.name: All Ages
sessionAttributes.description: Get ready for maximum family fun! Our All Ages screenings include pre-show activity sheets and crayons, a relaxed noise policy, kids menus, and a free prize for kids 12 and under. All ages welcome with a parent or guardian.

sessionAttributes.name: Brunch
sessionAttributes.description: Both our regular and Brunch menus are available at this screening. Arrive hungry.

sessionAttributes.name: Kid Friendly
sessionAttributes.description: Grab the fam and let the fun begin! Our Kid Friendly screenings include pre-show activity sheets and crayons, a relaxed noise policy, kids menus, and a free prize for kids 12 and under. Ages 3+ welcome with a parent or guardian.

sessionAttributes.name: Buffer Seating
sessionAttributes.description: We’re leaving some seats empty for the health and safety of our guests. When you select seats, we will automatically place "buffer" seats on either side of your selection that will be unavailable for purchase.

formats.title: 2D Digital
